alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Washington, central Morgan and northern Wood Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marietta, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marietta, McConnelsville, Beverly, Williamstown, Boaz, Malta, Lowell, Stockport, Bristol, Macksburg, Lower Salem, Hackney, Eagleport and Devola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia near mile marker 186. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
